long_description: The Thule Insta-Gater(TM) Truck Bike Rack is a fast, easy and stable method for carrying a bike in the back of your pick-up truck bed. RQL (Ratcheting Quick-Load) system easily and securely holds your bike. No drilling or bolting required, so installation is a breeze. Wheel stays on bike during transport. Carrier does not come in contact with bike. Fits wheels from 20-29" and up to 3"-wide tires. Thule One-Key(TM)-compatible system lets you purchase lock cores that match keys you already own.
short_description: The Thule Insta-Gater(TM) Truck Bike Rack is a fast, easy and stable method for carrying a bike in the back of your pick-up truck bed.
